text:
i use the news mod_auth_ldap from http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/httpd-ldap/
and have changed to compilation under 2.0.36 the APR_OFFSETOF to APR_XtOffsetOf. 
But the caching from the module have a memoryfault, the memoryconsuming from
15000 request's are 90MB.
i hope the patching from APR_XtOffsetOf have not correction the memoryfault
correcting!?!? 
When i set all cachedirectives off, no memoryfaults.

Ronny
creator: rweb007@web.de

text:
Could you please try with the most recent CVS version of httpd-2.0 (which
now includes mod_auth_ldap) to see if the problem persists.
creator: slive@apache.org
